hero.description: The Shield of Athena is a non-profit organization for victims of family violence. We offer emergency shelter and professional services to women and their children.
hero.imageAlt: A supportive illustration representing safety and care

items.text: Bouclier d'Athéna helped my family feel safe and supported. Their team was present at every step and made sure we had the resources we needed.
items.name: Mackie Clonts

items.text: The support and guidance I received was life-changing. I couldn't have navigated this difficult time without their compassionate team.
items.name: Sarah Johnson

items.text: Professional, caring, and always available. They truly go above and beyond to help those in need.
items.name: Michael Chen

items.text: Their dedication to helping families is remarkable. I'm grateful for everything they've done for our community.
items.name: Emily Rodriguez

items.text: A beacon of hope during challenging times. Their services made all the difference for my family.
items.name: David Thompson
